com.casino.games.slotgames

Class RandomMersenneTwister

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.casino.games.slotgames.RandomMersenneTwister
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RandomStrategy

    public class RandomMersenneTwister
extends java.lang.Object
implements RandomStrategy
    Class for generating 32-bit random numbers using the Random Mersenne Twister pseudo-random number generator. It DOES passes the Marsaglia’s Diehard Battery of Tests of Randomness.
    Author:
    imetaxas
